description: Try our easy to follow Caramel & Fig Marshmallow Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Caramel & Fig Marshmallow Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread over caramel layer and sprinkle with coconut. Set aside at room temperature for 30 minutes. Cut into squares and drizzle with reserved caramel. Store in an airtight container.
